comment: The team Summerlin on Lake Mead and Buffalo here in was wonderful and is always so pleasant! Please share the fabulous customer experience they provided meLoved my vaccinator- he was funny and painless!
amr:
# ::snt The team Summerlin on Lake Mead and Buffalo here in was wonderful and is always so pleasant! Please share the fabulous customer experience they provided meLoved my vaccinator- he was funny and painless!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (w / wonderful-03
                  :ARG1 (t / team
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Summerlin")
                        :location (a2 / and
                              :op1 (l / lake
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Lake"
                                          :op2 "Mead"))
                              :op2 (c / city
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Buffalo"))
                              :location (h / here))))
            :op2 (p / pleasant-02
                  :ARG1 t
                  :time (a3 / always)
                  :degree (s / so)))
      :snt2 (s2 / share-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (e / experience-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / customer)
                  :ARG1-of (f / fabulous-03)
                  :ARG1-of (p2 / provide-01
                        :ARG0 t
                        :ARG2 (ii / i))))
      :snt3 (a4 / and
            :op1 (f2 / funny-02
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (v / vaccinate-01
                              :ARG1 ii)))
            :op2 (p4 / pain-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 p3)))

comment: Thank you, Kat. We always love to hear about your positive experiences with Walgreens! I will be happy to share your feedback with leadership. ^SG
amr:
# ::snt Thank you, Kat. We always love to hear about your positive experiences with Walgreens! I will be happy to share your feedback with leadership. ^SG
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / thank-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Kat")))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (l / love-02
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (h / hear-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (e / experience-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (c / company
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Walgreens"))
                              :mod (p2 / positive)))
                  :time (a2 / always))
            :op2 (h2 / happy-01
                  :ARG0 (s / share-01
                        :ARG0 (ii / i)
                        :ARG1 (f / feedback)
                        :ARG2 (p3 / person
                              :ARG0-of (l2 / lead-02)))
                  :ARG1 ii))
      :snt3 (p4 / person
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "SG")))
